Package gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.web.tags.csm

Class Summary
AuthorizationDecisionCache This class caches the result of authorization calls made in the current session.
AuthorizationDecisionCacheTest AuthorizationDecisionCache Tester.
CSMAccessControlTag This is coded in the same lines of gov.nih.nci.cabig.ctms.acegi.csm.web.CSMAccessControlTag The tag usages :- <csmauthz:accesscontrol domainObject="${task}" authorizationCheckName="taskAuthorizationCheck" /> or <csmauthz:accesscontrol domainObject="${task}" authorizationCheckName="siteAuthorizationCheck" hasPrivileges="user_admin" /> or <csmauthz:accesscontrol domainObject="${task}" authorizationCheckName="taskAuthorizationCheck" hasPrivileges="ACCESS" /> or <csmauthz:accesscontrol domainObject="${task}" authorizationCheckName="taskAuthorizationCheck" objectPrivilege="gov.nih..Study:READ" />
SwapAuthenticationsTag Used to swap out Authentication objects in the current security context.
